segments.text: What are the best places to visit here please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends If you are interested in the city.you might like to tour it by car I can be your guide , We'll leave the afternoon free.You can do some shopping in the mall if you like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . What do you suggest we see ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suggest we visit the Metropolitan Museum of Art first , Now let's go.look people are jogging along the river.Here we are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The exhibits are really special . I enjoy the paintings very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So do I . This is Broadway.There are lots of theaters . This way leads to Times Square .
segments.speaker: S2
